text: 4. Kami bertanggung jawab atas sistem 4. We are responsible for the internal control of
pengendalian interen dalam Reksa Dana the Mutual Fund in accordance with our duties
sesuai dengan tugas dan tanggung jawab and responsibilities as the Investment
Manajer Investasi sebagaimana tercantum Manager as stated in the Collective Investment
dalam Kontrak Investasi Kolektif Reksa Dana Contract of the Mutual Fund and the prevailing
serta menurut peraturan dan perundangan laws and regulations.
